name: Dramble
preparation:
In this riff on the Bramble, the honeyed fruits and floral notes of Dewar's 12-year-old scotch play well with the Briottet crème de mûre liqueur while taking the drink in an entirely different direction.

Combine the scotch, lemon juice and syrup in a shaker with ice, and shake.

Fine-strain into a hurricane glass over crushed ice, and drizzle with the liqueur.

Garnish with a lemon twist.
